rules.name: OpenAI API Key
rules.description: OpenAI API key (sk-...). Grants full access to OpenAI models and billing.

rules.name: OpenAI Project Key
rules.description: OpenAI project-scoped API key (sk-proj-...). Scoped to a specific project.

rules.name: Anthropic API Key
rules.description: Anthropic API key (sk-ant-...). Grants access to Claude models.

rules.name: AWS Access Key ID
rules.description: AWS IAM access key ID (AKIA...). Used with secret key for AWS API authentication.

rules.name: AWS Secret Access Key
rules.description: AWS secret access key (40-char base64). Paired with access key ID for AWS authentication.

rules.name: GitHub Personal Access Token
rules.description: GitHub classic personal access token (ghp_...). May have broad repository and account access.

rules.name: GitHub OAuth Token
rules.description: GitHub OAuth access token (gho_...). Used by OAuth apps to access user data.

rules.name: GitHub App Token
rules.description: GitHub App installation token (ghs_...). Short-lived, scoped to app permissions.

rules.name: GitHub Fine-Grained PAT
rules.description: GitHub fine-grained personal access token (github_pat_...). Scoped to specific repos and permissions.

rules.name: GitLab Personal Access Token
rules.description: GitLab personal access token (glpat-...). Grants API and repository access.

rules.name: Stripe Live Secret Key
rules.description: Stripe live secret key (sk_live_...). Grants full access to production payment operations.

rules.name: Stripe Test Secret Key
rules.description: Stripe test secret key (sk_test_...). Sandbox mode, no real charges.

rules.name: Stripe Publishable Key
rules.description: Stripe publishable key (pk_live_...). Client-safe, limited to tokenization.

rules.name: Slack Bot Token
rules.description: Slack bot token (xoxb-...). Allows bot to read/send messages and access workspace data.

rules.name: Slack User Token
rules.description: Slack user token (xoxp-...). Acts on behalf of a user with their full permissions.

rules.name: Twilio API Key
rules.description: Twilio API key SID (SK...). Used for REST API authentication.

rules.name: SendGrid API Key
rules.description: SendGrid API key (SG.xxx.xxx). Grants access to email sending and account management.

rules.name: Mailgun API Key
rules.description: Mailgun API key (key-...). Grants access to email sending and domain management.

rules.name: NPM Access Token
rules.description: NPM access token (npm_...). Can publish packages and modify registry settings.

rules.name: PyPI API Token
rules.description: PyPI API token (pypi-...). Can upload and manage Python packages.

rules.name: Heroku API Key
rules.description: Heroku API key (HRKU-...). Grants full access to Heroku account and apps.

rules.name: Google API Key
rules.description: Google API key (AIza...). Used for Google Cloud and Firebase services.

rules.name: HuggingFace Access Token
rules.description: HuggingFace user access token (hf_...). Grants access to models, datasets, and Spaces.

rules.name: Supabase Service Key
rules.description: Supabase service role key (sbp_...). Bypasses Row Level Security.

rules.name: Vercel Token
rules.description: Vercel API token (vercel_...). Grants access to deployments and project settings.

rules.name: Groq API Key
rules.description: Groq API key (gsk_...). Grants access to Groq inference API.

rules.name: Replicate API Token
rules.description: Replicate API token (r8_...). Grants access to run AI models.

rules.name: Firebase Server Key
rules.description: Firebase Cloud Messaging server key (AAAA...). Can send push notifications to any device.

rules.name: Discord Bot Token
rules.description: Discord bot token. Grants full control over the bot account.

rules.name: JSON Web Token
rules.description: JWT token (eyJ...). May contain session data or authentication claims. Only flagged when near secret-related keywords.
